description: Analyzes incoming queries, creates execution plans, coordinates multi-agent workflows, manages handoffs, aggregates results
Searches databases, retrieves property data, queries external APIs, fetches market intelligence, validates addresses
Analyzes data patterns, scores buyer-property matches, assesses market positioning, prioritizes opportunities, generates strategic recommendations
Writes property descriptions, generates email responses, creates vendor reports, produces marketing copy, personalizes communications
Validates content compliance, performs AML checks, ensures regulatory requirements, screens for issues, issues certificates
